channel.title: Pages on Stefan Haider
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Stefan Haider

item.title: About me
item.author: website@haider.io (Stefan Haider)
item.description: My name is Stefan Haider. I’m currently finishing my Master in “Software Engineering and Internet Computing” at Vienna University of Technology. Besides that I work as a .Net developer at SBA Research. If you want to know more feel free to contact me..

item.title: Projects
item.author: website@haider.io (Stefan Haider)
item.description: You can find my projects on my GitHub page. My Bank Data Downloader is available for installation here. Bank Manager, the successor of this project is also available on GitHub. I don’t provide a installer yet. With PSD2 on it’s way this project maybe loose it’s Selenium based download component. A lot of university related stuff is also available on GitHub.
